name: holygrail2
description: A minimal, responsive, style-agnostic CSS framework.

scripts.deploy: git add . && (git commit -m "$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" || echo 'No hay cambios para commit') && git push origin main && npm publish
scripts.css: sass --quiet-deps --silence-deprecation=import scss/style.scss dist/style.css && sass --quiet-deps --silence-deprecation=import scss/style-rtl.scss dist/style-rtl.css && sass --quiet-deps --silence-deprecation=import scss/docs.scss dist/docs.css
scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run css && npm run site
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run open:guide
scripts.docs: sass --quiet-deps --silence-deprecation=import scss/docs.scss doc/docs.css --style expanded && sass --quiet-deps --silence-deprecation=import scss/docs.scss doc/docs.min.css --style compressed
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build

author: Manuel Ruiz
